item.title: How It Works
item.description: In a nutshell s3mon will list and search for files of a certain pattern on a list of defifned buckets that are not older than a defined period. These options are defined in a config.yml file (YAML formated) The config file (prototype) Example of a config file: --- s3mon: endpoint: s3.provider access_key: ACCESS_KEY_ID secret_key: SECRET_ACCESS_KEY buckets: bucket_A: - prefix: starts_with_foo age: 86400 size: 30720 bucket_B: - prefix: file age: 43200 size: 1024 - prefix: exact_file_name age: 43200
